summary: Implemented all fixes from the validated review plan for the Beauty Booking module. Added commission discount for Top Rated salons in BeautyCommissionService by checking for active Top Rated badge and applying configurable discount. Created BeautyReviewObserver and BeautyBookingObserver to automatically recalculate badges when reviews or bookings change. Added updateSalonStatistics() and updateCancellationRate() methods to BeautySalonService. Registered observers in BeautyBookingServiceProvider. Verified API response format consistency, error message translations, view files completeness, and route middleware - all are properly implemented. All critical and medium priority issues have been resolved.
current_status: All Phase 1 fixes (commission discount and automatic badge updates) have been implemented. Phase 2 code quality review completed - all aspects verified as correct. The module is ready for testing. Created comprehensive validation results document. All todos from the plan have been completed.
